20200606 CHURCHILL DOWNS 2 2 $2,200 N Y http://www.test.equineline.com/to/be/determined/00003.htm update on line 47: + **FLAMING HEART** (2001 f. by Touch Gold). 4 wins at 4 and 5, $185,914, in N.A./U.S., 1st Strolling Belle S.-R (AQU, $37,350), 2nd Next Move H. **[G3]** (AQU, $21,364); winner in 2 starts at 5, $67,500, in Canada, 1st Hill 'n' Dale S. [L] (WO, $60,000). (Total: $245,961). Died 2021. Dam of 11 foals, 9 to race, 8 winners-- Dam is in line 44: **HOT LEAR**, by Lear Fan. 4 wins in 7 starts at 2 and 4, $106,050, 1st Santa Clara H. (BM, $25,230), Courtship S. (BM, $19,600), Bay Meadows Debutante S. (BM, $19,670), 2nd Fremont H. (BM, $9,000), 3rd Miss America H. [L] (GG, $18,000). Sent from United States to Saudi Arabia in 2010. Half-sister to **INTERN** ($392,729, 1st Sea O Erin Breeders' Cup Mile H. [L] (AP, $72,780), etc.), **LOVE MEDICINE** ($149,561, 1st West Long Branch S. (MTH, $24,000), etc.).
